name: Suspicious Voice
text:
...Eh, the other day, what?
You seriously don't know?
No way...?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Ta-da! The answer was, it was your dear uncle—!
It's been a long time, [Player]-kun,
how have you been?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I was so happy you called out to me
that I even stayed overnight in Orient City!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
...Eh, "you're lying"?
You knew I was working here with Kouki-kun the day before!?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Achaa~ you found me out, huh.
[Player]-kun, you really have quite the information network.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
But I'm really happy to see you.
So, what can this old man do for you today?
If there's anything I can help with—

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Well, I was kind of hoping this would happen,
but when it actually does, it still leaves me confused, you know?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh, I'm so happy~ a present from you!
Hey, are you doing this out of obligation? Or are you being serious?
Am I being too much of an old man by asking this?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Because I'm curious, you know,
you're getting quite serious advances
from "all sorts of people".

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I'm worried about what I'd do if you eventually stopped paying attention to me,
who you barely see because of "work"~.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
So... I've been thinking recently that it might be better
if I came to pick you up before that happens.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Anyway, if you're going to be in danger,
I'd rather protect you by your side
than from a distance...

name: Tsuneaki
text:
—Just kidding!
Sorry, sorry, I just got carried away after getting a present from you.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Alright, enough embarrassing talk!
Please let me make up for my hasty remarks
with some delicious food!

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I got my own hidden gem of a restaurant in Orient City.
Let me introduce you to it as my thanks for the present.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
It's on me, of course.
I want to hear all about your stories too.
I already booked a private room, so come on, let me guide you there~!
